runs.comm: full overpitched delivery outside off, Tamim crashes it but straight to covers.
on a length this time, just outside off, mistimes the drive to mid-on. The bat-face shut a tad too early
drifts towards leg and middle, Tamim flicks it over square leg and Irfan comes around to prevent the boundary
full and outside off stump, Tamim flashes at it and it flies over Yusuf's head at first, and lone, slip
Wow! stunning hit over mid-on. He leaned forward to thrash the full delivery over the infield. Lovely clean swing of the bat. It wasn't a slog.
goes for it again but doesn't time it well and the ball falls short of mid-off this time
What a crushing blow from Siddique. And this was his first ball. It was slightly short in length and he rocked back to pull it high over midwicket
fuller, on the yorker length, dug out to the off side
another one almost dropping in the blockhole, turned to long leg for a single
length delivery, swinging away a bit,  Siddique checks his off drive and it flies off the edge to third man where Ishant makes a lunging stop near the rope
full and on the off stump line, mistimes the drive to mid-off
outside off stump, moves away, big swing and a miss.
quick one on the middle stump, pushed back to Yusuf, who is bowling with his sunglasses on
neat little paddle sweep and it's another boundary. Skillful shot.
Yusuf has struck in his first over. Tamim ran down the wicket for the big hit over the on side but missed it completely. Dhoni did the rest.
really quick skidding delivery outside off stump and Ash played inside the line and is beaten
another one darted in quickly, around the off stump, steered to third man
fires this one across as well, tapped to square leg for a single
fullish, on the middle, hint of inward movement, whipped to midwicket
cuts in from outside off stump, pushed towards mid-off and he calls his captain over for a quick single
length delivery on the off stump line, leans forward to defend and it runs off the inner edge to the on side and they scamper across
huge swing and a miss. It was in the zone outside off, Junaid tried to heave it across the line but couldn't connect
plants his front foot forward and whacks the full delivery between Ash and the umpire. Ashraful ducks. 147 to win now. Junaid moves to 15
Zaheer switches to round the stumps but it doesn't matter to Junaid who charges down the track to flat-bat it between Ash and mid-off for another boundary. The chase is on.
another really quick delivery on the middle, Ashraful moves outside leg, edges it to short third man
on the stumps again, turned to square leg
turns in slightly, opens the bat-face to guide it to left of short third man
dropped by Ishant Sharma. Tough chance. Junaid lifted it over mid-on and Ishant ran back, didn't judge it well and couldn't hold on
No mucking around by Junaid. Similar delivery and this time he ensures he doesn't get too much under the ball, holds his balance well and clears long-on effortlessly.
worked through the on side for a single

Full and moving away from Junaid who gives the almighty slog across the line and edges it to third man. Whenever he has tried to go over mid-on or mid-off he has looked well but at times, he has tried to drag it too much across the line

Very fine whipping on drive. It was on the middle and straightening but Ashraful whips it superbly through midwicket. A difficult shot but done with lots of flair. That's why every body rates him so high but he has a tendency to let down his fans often. They would hope this is one of the day when he shines
slightly short and Ashraful pulls it high over midwicket

He backs away from the stumps and crashes a full delivery but straight to the cover fielder. He connected it really well but couldn't get the placement. He shakes his head, shuts his eyes as he walks back. It was a good low catch from Gambhir ...
141.6 kmph bouncer and it climbs past the attempted pull shot
hmmm... bit of wild swing from Shakib. No wood on leather as the ball rushes past the edge
back of length, on the middle, pulled to deep midwicket
full, straight, quickish, turned past square leg for couple of runs
leans forward to push to wide long-on for two more runs
from round the stumps now to Shakib who backs away to cut it for a single
back over the stumps for Junaid who tucks it past square leg
slower, bit more air, heaved to long-off for a single
from round the stumps, slow loopy offspinner, goes for the big sweep but fails to connect
gets forward to drive to long-on
again slows up the pace, lands on the middle and off, spins away, sliced over backward point
quicker, full again, dragged down to long-on for another single
Junaid goes down town. He ran down the track, got to the pitch of the flighted delivery and lifted it far into the long-on stands
It was short but skidded on and Shakib went for the pull - he must have thought the shot was on - but got the top edge; a simple catch to Dhoni.
turns towards middle and off, tapped to the on side
turns in from outside off, checks his shot and it goes off the edge to short third man
goes for the sweep from outside off, edges it to short fine-leg region
Double strike from Ojha puts India in control. Junaid charged down the wicket but slog swept straight to deep midwicket
full and on the middle, turned to the on side
flighted outside off, slow through the air, turned around the corner to short fine-leg
tossed up outside off, full, swept to deep midwicket for a single
flighted full outside off, another sweep attempted but it rolls off the pad to the off side
full again, driven to left of Harbhajan who makes a diving stop
goes for the reverse sweep but Harbhajan had again slowed up the pace and he was early through his shot. The edge took the ball to short fine-leg
lunges forward to tap the off break to the leg side
turned to short fine leg region
flighted on the middle, slowly in the air, swept to short fine leg
leans forward to defend to the on side
slows up the pace further, really tossed it up and it turns past the bat and to DHoni
quicker, straighter on the off stump line, pushed to covers
lovely delivery , turn and bounce, goes for the sweep and misses it. He is hit on the pad and Ojha appeals for lbw .. but it was turning past the off stump
on the pads, rolls away to fine-leg .. some confusion regarding the second run but Raqibul is not interested
length delivery on the middle, defended to the on side, sets for a run, is sent back and Yuvraj fires a direct hit at the striker's end
shuffles across, tries to tickle it to the on side, misses and was struck in front of leg stump. Ishant appeals but looks like it would have missed the leg stump
back of length delivery, cutting in, defended to the on side ...
banged in short of length, backs away a touch to deliberately cut it over backward point ...
almost similar delivery, perhaps a bit more bounce and Raqibul went for the same shot but the ball bounced over the flashing blade
drifting in to the middle, worked to square leg
lands around off, turns away, again slow through the air, cuts to deep point
lovely loopy turning delivery, top edges the sweep but it lands safely behind square leg

Yuvraj takes a beauty at short fine-leg.  Mahmudullah paddled a delivery from the middle stump but didn't connect well. The ball looped in the air and appeared to be landing short of Yuvraj who dived forward to take a very good catch. Ojha continues to run hot.
turns past the off stump, pushed to cover
superb delivery, turn and bounce. It drifted in from round the stumps, landed on middle stump before breaking away sharply. It took the edge and ran down to short third man
goes down on his knee and slog sweeps it to deep midwicket
the doosra on the off stump line, goes for the reverse sweep and gets the edge, it runs past short third man

Dropped by Yuvraj. A simple chance too! He had just taken a stunner and has dropped a dolly now. It was the topspinner on the off stump line and got the edge on the sweep shot. Yuvraj came under it at short fine-leg but clanged it
turning in from outside off, full as well , dabbed to Irfan at short third man
turned to backward square leg for a single
ooh .. really quick yorker .. dug out by Mashrafe
flighted on the middle and off, swept away to deep midwicket
Mash goes big. Huge hit over long-on. He waited for the slow flighted delivery to arrive before lifting it high over the boundary.
charges out and goes inside-out to deep cover where Yusuf makes a fine diving stop near the ropes

Ojha has bowled Mashrafe. Neither Mash or Ojha knew! It was Dhoni who pointed it out to them. It spun from a length, from middle stump towards the off and turned past the attempted slog sweep. It brushed the outside half of the off stump
sharp turn again.. he is getting lovely drift and turn here ... jabbed out to the off side
beautiful delivery.. Ojha has bowled a dream spell today. This one looped up, dipped sharply before turning away with bounce to beat the slog sweep. Superb spell.
moves outside leg stump and slices it to Zaheer at deep point
kicks up from back of length, outside off stump, pushes at it and it flies off the edge to third man where Ojha makes a desperate dive but couldn't prevent the ball from rolling away to the boundary
guided straight to Ojha at third man
banged in short and it climbs over the attempted cut and settles into Dhoni's gloves
moves away to cut from the leg stump, down to Ojha at third man
back of length, bounces over the off and middle, steered to backward point
yorker length outside off, squeezed to point region
pushed across, outside off stump, can't reach. Wide.
Full in length, on the middle, Roqibul heaves it straight to Ojha at mid-on.
short in length, slanted across, defended to backward point
yorker on the middle and off stump line, dug out to the off side
full and outside off stump, sliced off the outer edge to Harbhajan at third man
bouncer just outside leg stump, shuffles across to pull but doesn't connect.
short in length, outside off, cut away to deep point
moves outside leg stump, tries to cut but doesn't put bat to the topspinner and Dhoni gathers
backs away again and punches it through cover point
shapes to move outside leg before shuffling back in line to push it to cover
comes down the track, Harbhajan drags back the length, pushed back to the bowler
slows up the pace and Mushfiqir edges the sweep towards deep midwicket
turns in from outside off stump, tapped through cover point
from round the stumps, full and on the off stump, heaved across through midwicket
full in length, just outside off, tapped to backward point
drifts it down the leg side ..
from over the stumps. full toss outside off, goes for the big swing but gets a bottom edge and the ball rolls to the keeper
slower one, full in length, Naeem waited for it before playing a top shot over long-off. Too late in the day, though.
yorker length outside off stump, can't get bat on ball and Dhoni collects
full again, driven to long-off for a single
Impressive hit to long-off boundary. Naeem moved outside leg stump and flat-batted the short-of-length delivery over long-off. It was a fierce forehand down the line
Even bigger. Naeem is showing some real talent here. Again Ishant followed him as he moved down the leg side but he held his balance well to flat bat a forehand cross court over long-on for a big six
driven down to long-on for a single
low full toss, pushed down to long-on
Yuvraj takes another very good catch. Naeem had lifted one towards long-off where Yuvraj was staitioned. Yuvraj rushed down, lunged forward to take a nice diving catch
full pitched on the off stump, driven to the off side .. And India, the defending champions, have won.
